portal.pledges1: 1ã€Embrace FollowFi's core values in every part of our lives: Discipline,Unity,Courage,and Effort.
portal.pledges2: 2ã€Secure our wallets,keep handwritten mnemonic records,and avoid connecting wallets to sketchy dApps.
portal.pledges3: 3ã€Stay ahead with the latest tech trends,learn continuously,and share insights generously.
portal.pledges4: 4ã€Grow our wealth by consistently acquiring valuable assets and using smart compounding.
portal.pledges5: 5ã€Plan wisely,spend and invest with reason,cut unnecessary costs,and prioritize health.
portal.pledges6: 6ã€Uphold fairness, reject unjust actions, and oppose those who try to go against this principle.
portal.pledges7: 7ã€Pool resources for significant investments aiming for higher returns.
portal.pledges8: 8ã€Stand by to support one another whenever challenges arise.
portal.pledges9: 9ã€Unite to address any discipline issues within our communities.
portal.pledges10: 10ã€Introduce physical activities in all communities and actively join social events.
